definition: Swarm Electric Field Instrument (EFI) Thermal Ion Imager (TII) Raw and Corrected Imagery and Spectra at High resolution (TISH)
description:
Swarm Electric Field Instrument (EFI) Thermal Ion Imager (TII) raw and corrected imagery and column sum spectra products at high resolution. 
Measurements are derived by University of Calgary within the "TII Raw And Corrected Imagery / Spectra" (TRACIS) project.
This product represents an official archive of Level 0 TII full images and derived (Level 1B) gain-corrected images and energy and angle-of-arrival count-rate spectra.
The high-resolution (HR) product consists of the Level 0 TII column sum count-rates at a cadence of 2 spectra per second.
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp 			,  UTC ,  time of observation								, 1,	CDF_EPOCH 
Latitude 			,  deg ,  Geocentric latitude of orbit 						, 1,	CDF_REAL8  	
Longitude 			,  deg ,  Geocentric longitude of orbit 					, 1,	CDF_REAL8  	
Radius 				,  m 	, Geocentric radius of orbit  						, 1,	CDF_REAL8 	
TII_imaging_mode 	,  - 	, Imaging mode. 0: non-nominal; 1: nominal science  , 1,	CDF_UINT1 	
V_MCP_Setting_H 	,  V 	, H sensor MCP front voltage setting 				, 1,	CDF_REAL4 	
V_MCP_ Setting_V 	,  V 	, V sensor MCP front voltage setting  				, 1,	CDF_REAL4 	
V_Phos_ Setting_H 	,  V 	, H sensor phosphor voltage setting  				, 1,	CDF_REAL4 	
V_Phos_ Setting_V 	,  V	, V sensor phosphor voltage setting  				, 1,	CDF_REAL4  	
V_Bias_ Setting_H 	,  V 	, H sensor inner dome bias voltage setting  		, 1,	CDF_REAL4 	
V_Bias_ Setting_V 	,  V 	, V sensor inner dome bias voltage setting 	 		, 1,	CDF_REAL4 	
Column_sum_spectrum_H,  DN ,  H sensor column sum spectrum 			, 2,	CDF_UINT2 	
Column_sum_spectrum_V,  DN ,  V sensor column sum spectrum 			, 2,	CDF_UINT2 	
Column_sum_energies_H,  eV ,  H sensor column sum spectrum energies 		, 2,	CDF_REAL4 	
Column_sum_energies_V,  eV ,  V sensor column sum spectrum energies 		, 2,	CDF_REAL4
